inclusion.criterion: Elective or semi-elective/urgent Cardiac surgery patients in whom CPB is a planned part of the procedure.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Urinary catheter is planned during the surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pre-operative dialysis dependent end stage renal disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a urinary catheter in place due to a urethral stricture.
